arts.ttl: “Unacceptable” | West Ham suffer defeat at Wolves
arts.sum: West Ham fall short at Wolves with abysmal performance. It’s been a season that can’t be over any sooner from a West Ham perspective. Across the campaign, there’s been very few moments for the Hammers to truly celebrate with the side now just going through the motions. Unfortunately, despite defensive improvements, things are still dismal... The post “Unacceptable” | West Ham suffer defeat at Wolves appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Vitor Pereira emotional after Wolves move closer to safety with West Ham win
arts.sum: Jorgen Strand Larsen’s deflected strike moved Wolves 12 points clear of the drop.

arts.ttl: Wolves ease relegation fears with crucial win against West Ham
arts.sum: Jorgen Strand Larsen was the hero as Wolverhampton Wanderers moved 12 points clear of the Premier League relegation zone with a 1-0 win over West Ham United . West Ham's Niclas Fullkrug hit the bar, while Tomas Soucek fired wide from close range late on, but the Hammers generally struggled to mount a sustained attacking threat, as they suffered their fourth defeat in seven away matches in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Wolves 1-0 West Ham: Jorgen Strand Larsen goal sinks Hammers to ease Wolves' relegation fears
arts.sum: A disappointing night for the Hammers on their return to Premier league action
Wolves head coach Vitor Pereira praises his side's "high quality" 1-0 Premier League win over West Ham at Molineux.

As half-time approached, Andre came close to scoring his first in an old gold shirt when he found space on the left-wing position, and cut inside on to his right foot, before spiralling a shot just over the West Ham net, concluding a strong first-half performance for Wolves. Doherty continued his run, received a return pass inside the penalty area, and cut the ball back to Strand Larsen, whose effort just missed the mark at the front post.

arts.ttl: Standards need to be higher - Potter
arts.sum: West Ham manager Graham Potter says "standards need to be higher" after his side's 1-0 Premier League defeat by Wolves at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Wolves take another step towards safety as Jorgen Strand Larsen downs West Ham
arts.sum: Wolves are 12 points clear of danger.

arts.ttl: Ferguson & Luis Guilherme make full debuts at Molineux
arts.sum: The 19-year-old had started the three games prior to the Everton fixture and returns to the side in place of the man who started at Goodison, Emerson. Ferguson starts fresh from scoring for his country in Ireland’s UEFA Nations League B/C play-off victory over Bulgaria during the March international window.

arts.ttl: Arsenal vs Fulham - Premier League: Live score, team news and updates as Bukayo Saka returns to Gunners squad as they look to keep alive slim title hopes, with top flight football returning after international break
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Arsenal host Fulham at the Emirates, whole West Ham travel to Molineux to face Wolves in the Premier League.
